ygData.subject: Kelin's lute and small brass trumpet
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I ve certainly killed enough mobs in Mistmoore if thats the criteria. I ve also done the mail runs on at least 30-40 occasions. Question: Does raising
ygData.messageBody:
Well I've certainly killed enough mobs in Mistmoore if thats the criteria.
I've also done the mail runs on at least 30-40 occasions.

Question: Does raising faction with The League of Antonican Bards (increased
when killing Mistmoore mobs) raise faction with all three bard guilds?

Also, other than bard NPCs in the three guilds and the bard messengers
posted in or near all the city zones, what other bard NPCs are there in the
game? I know of one in South Karana (Vhalen?) and one in the East Freeport
tavern near the dock. Off the top of my head I can't remember any more bard
NPCs. Anyone out there got a complete list of bard NPCs and where they are
located? They should be the first ones we check.

Galtin of E'ci

>
> > (to my knowledge). If morning dew is in the game but hard to find, I
> think
> > the plan we implemented should have found it. But based on our negative
> > results, everyone came to the conclusion that Verant was incorrect in
> > claiming morning dew was in the game.
> >
> > Now we have GZ telling us that Kelin's lute and the small brass trumpet
> are
> > in the game but hard to find. Assuming these are acquired via a quest,
> I
> > would think that trying something similar to what the brewers tried with
> > morning dew is the first step to discovering the secret. I think we can
>
> You also might need the correct faction. Perhaps having
> killed enough mobs in Mistmoore and delivered enough mail will
> do it.
>
>
